column1:
#access {
    	padding:0 20px;
    	background:#111;
    	box-shadow:0 0 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
    }
    
    #access ul {
    	float:left;
    	padding:0;
    	margin:0;
    	list-style:none;
    	font-weight:600;
    	text-transform:uppercase;
    }
    
    #access li {
    	position:relative;
    	float:left;
    	padding:0;
    	margin:0;
    }
    
    #access ul li:first-child {
    	padding-left:0;
    }
    
    #access a {
    	display:block;
    	padding:15px 24px;
    	color:#f0f0f0;
    	text-decoration:none;
    
    }
    
    #menu-sample-menu li {
        color: black;
        text-shadow: 0px 1px 4px #777;
        background-color: green;
    	padding: 0 12px 0 12px;
    }
    
    #menu-sample-menu li a.hover {
        background: orange;
    }
    
    
    #access li.current_page_item > a,
    #access li.current-menu-item > a {
    	background: orange;
    	color: white;
    	text-decoration:none;
    }
    
    #access a span {
    	color:#999;
    	font-size:11px;
    	font-style:italic;
    	font-weight:normal;
    	line-height:1.62em;
    	text-transform:none;
    }
